text: Soubakaniédougou is a town in southwestern Burkina Faso. By road, it is about 40 km south-west of the town of Banfora, and about 125 km south-west of the city of Bobo-Dioulasso. The town has a population of 9,423. It is the capital of Soubakaniédougou Department.Burkinabé government inforoute communale ==References== ==External links== *Satellite map at Maplandia.com Category:Populated places in the Cascades Region Category:Comoé Province
title: Soubakaniédougou
